title: MeshSpace - Social Media Platform
description: Full-stack social media application with real-time features. Built with React/TypeScript frontend and Node.js/Express backend. Features include user authentication with email verification, JWT tokens, user profiles with avatar uploads, post creation with image support, trending/following feeds, threaded comments with replies and mentions, real-time notifications via Socket.io, search functionality, and responsive UI with dark mode. All media uploads use Cloudinary with file validation, and the platform includes forgot/reset password flows with email service integration.
features: User authentication with email verification and JWT tokens
Profile management with Cloudinary avatar uploads
Post creation with image support and repost functionality
Trending and following feeds with real-time updates
Threaded comments with replies and mentions
Search functionality for users and posts
Responsive UI with dark mode and toast notifications
File validation (2MB limit, image-only) for all uploads
highlights: Implemented robust authentication flow with long-lived tokens
Built real-time notification system using Socket.io
Integrated Cloudinary for all media uploads with proper validation
Created trending algorithm for post discovery
Designed responsive UI with modern design system
Implemented optimistic UI updates for better UX
Added comprehensive error handling and logging
